column3: “Rolled a nice cone and put out down after 4 to 5 hits lol. 5 all day. Im feeling really good and ready i like how it really uplifting but still Mellow, and no Muncie.  My#3 fave out of 5...”
“Excellent! Got a gram of this on special at Harvest of Tempe ($11). My new fav.”
“Pretty nice bud, no munchies which I like. Feeling relaxed, but wanting to chit chat. Overall 4.5”
“Great strain, I only have to pack one good bowl and right away I start feeling it. Defiantly a go to strain in a pinch with a great taste. 👌🏻”
“Very happy, floaty sensation. Anxiety melted away, minimal munchies - a great new strain to find”

“I love Sputnik. It has such a good flavor and keeps me active. It is an intense head high that I really enjoy if I'm going out and doing things. Don't tend to get the munchies or anything on this, but cotton mouth is a factor. Still, the high is great.”

“One of my favorite strains! I only smoked half a bowl and I was gone. For me it came in stages. It started off with a nice easy mellow high, then all at once hit me in the head and I was on the ground laughing hard asf. After laughing hardcore for like 5 minutes, it left me with a decent head high and super relaxed which was perfect to couch with.”

“I love Sputnik. It has such a good flavor and keeps me active. It is an intense head high that I really enjoy if I'm going out and doing things. Don't tend to get the munchies or anything on this, but cotton mouth is a factor. Still, the high is great.”

“Man i am really up there!  Wow sputnik has to be some of the most enjoyable weed for me...
It's by far my favorite hybrid strain,  and i love its a sativa dominate.  It make me feel really happy, energetic, and ready to take on the day.  I don't feel any pain in my hip, or lumbar and I'm able to be productive. So i give this a solid 5*****....”
“real nice very good tast is very very good!!”

“2 hits to liftoff. Decent buzz out of the launchpad. mid buzz nice and headize, no burn out at the end. 
good strain to kick back, and rate strains.”
“uplifting high, not too overwhelming like some other sativas. only issue was that god awful taste and smell.”

“When I bought it, I was told it was identical to Casey Jones... I disagree. I smoked it several times, then used the rest to make cookies. I enjoyed it much more in the cookies than in my pipe... I think I might try it again the next time I see it.”
“I'm not an indica fan, so I'm already based. but either way, I'll give it it's due. not a strain I would get, but I'm a top shelf kinda guy, but after a while, it's worth the money if ur in a pinch”
